enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Co-Requisite: Students must also register for Chemistry 103-0 01 at 9AM.
Add both classes to the shopping cart and submit together for successful registration.
title: WCAS CHEM 123-0-01 General Physical Chemistry Laboratory

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Chemistry laboratory techniques applied to biosensor technology using concepts of acid-base chemistry, kinetics, and the like. Design of a biosensor. Planning, data collection, interpretation, and reporting on experiments.

Chemistry 123-0 is the laboratory course associated with Chemistry 103-0.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Prerequisite: Students must earn a grade of C- or better in Chem 102-0 and Chem 122-0.

Students enrolled in Chemistry 123-0 MUST also enroll in Chemistry 103-0.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
1. Electronic Lab Notebook ($30; details to be provided in course syllabus)
2. Turning Technologies Model QT or NXT "Clicker" and associated license ($58.65 new; $44.00 used)***
3. Approved laboratory safety eyewear ($10)
4. 100% Cotton laboratory coat ($45)

Items 3 and 4 will be sold during the first week of classes. Details TBA.

***Prices as listed at Northwestern Norris Bookstore on 2/3/17. Materials may be available from other vendors at lower prices.

subject: CHEM
